name: Hanza Hotel

reviews.text: The Hanza Hotel has one of the best locations in Gdansk. The hotel is along the riverwalk and faces the river. The actual entrance to the hotel is the street behind.
reviews.title: The best location.

reviews.text: Check-in was smooth and the front desk staff was very professional. My room faced the river with great large windows. The room itself was big - think American style hotel rooms - much larger than what I normally encounter while traveling in Europe. Large, comfy bed with nice linens. Plenty of room for your clothes and luggage. The rooms have an electric kettle, tea bags, instant coffee and complimentary sparkling and still water that is replenished daily.
reviews.title: Christmas Break

reviews.text: Bathroom was good size with nice fluffy towels, plenty of hot water and water pressure.
reviews.title: Fantastic

reviews.text: Housekeeping staff was excellent. I would put the sign on the door for housekeeping service and by the time I finished breakfast, my room was cleaned.
reviews.title: Great location

reviews.text: Free Internet (yeah!) and had a good connection in my room. All rooms are non-smoking (yeah!) per requests of previous people who stayed in the hotel. There was a sign in my room that if there was smoking, an additional charge/fine of 299 zlotys (about $100 USD) would be charged because the room couldn't be rented for a day in order to air it out. Thank you Hanza management for making the hotel non-smoking.
reviews.title: Only ok

description: Hanza Hotel is located in the centre of the Old Town, on the historic passage of the Motława River, in the proximity of the Famous Gdańsk Crane.
